name: Project Gravity (juin, Mehtschmann)
description:
Project Gravity is a simple Platformer with an interesting Gravity Flipping mechanic and an emphasis on Speedrunning.

Try your skills in 40 different Levels and compare your times against our Dev Times or against other players via the Online Leaderboards.

A Controller is recommended, but it can also be played with a Keyboard.

Project Gravity was made in 1 Month as a practice project. So any Feedback is highly appreciated.
